properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 7:00PM EST until January 16 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to less than 1 NM.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells
Inlet SC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST THURSDAY
